snippet: Sunderland can beat the odds and stay up despite being bottom of the Premier League at Christmas, manager Gus Poyet said after an emphatic 4-1 win at fellow strugglers Fulham on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: Sunderland Can Survive Says Poyet After Win at Fulham
headline.main: Sunderland Can Survive Says Poyet After Win at Fulham

lead_paragraph: Sunderland can beat the odds and stay up despite being bottom of the Premier League at Christmas, manager Gus Poyet said after an emphatic 4-1 win at fellow strugglers Fulham on Saturday.
